WorkflowInfo.Name: Set Active Directory user property
WorkflowInfo.Description: Sets the user mobile on the Active Directory according to pre-defined excel file
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:ReadXLS;Assembly=ReadXLS, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:ADSetProperty;Assembly=ADSetProperty, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\users.xls" Password="" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns2:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /><ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns3:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="UserMobile" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns4:ADSetProperty Password="" PropertyValue="%UserMobile%" DisplayName="AD Set Property" IsValid="True" HostId="40" Path="{x:Null}" x:Name="adSetProperty1" TypeName="ADSetProperty" Description="Active directory set a user property." TimeInSeconds="0" HostName="AD-SERVER" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="" PropertyName="mobile" PropertyDisplay="Mobile" ADUserName="%UserName%" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
